```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.retina = 2)
d <- read_csv("results.csv")
```

```{r results-columns, fig.height = 9}
d %>% 
  ggplot(aes(mean, cpu)) +
  scale_x_continuous("Mean execution time") +
  geom_col() +
  facet_wrap("expr", nrow = 3) +
  theme(axis.title.y = element_blank())
```
